name: Recipe Calorie Calculator (Toolbar))
description: Adds a textbox to copy and paste your recipe ingredients.
content_security_policy: default-src 'none'; style-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval'; object-src 'self'; connect-src https://recipecalcalc.com/ http://localhost:1243/; img-src https://maps.google.com
